subtitle: Nowadays, the trout is farmed with no detriment to the taste or texture.

method.text: Wash and dry the trout fillets. Season lightly.

Melt about <sup>1</sup>/<sub>4</sub> of the butter in a large frying pan and as soon as it starts to foam, add fillets, skin side down. Fry gently for 3 min, carefully flip over and cook for 1 min. Using a fish slice, transfer trout to heated plates and keep warm in low oven.
Add remaining butter to pan with capers and dill and fry until golden brown. Add lime juice to taste and season. Spoon over trout.

title: Trout fillets with lime and caper sauce
